post:
Hello!

Stock is extremely limited on this offer.

All of our Florida VPSs are running:

- RAID 10 Storage with BBU.
- Dual Intel E5-2620v2 or above CPU
- Free Instant Setup with love!
- Supermicro Servers
- 24x7 Support
- SolusVM
- rDNS Capability
- 1Gbps Port

====================================

>**LEB Linux VPS Package**
>
>- 2GB Ram
>- 25GB Disk Space (Hardware RAID 10 w/BBU)
>- 1TB Bandwidth
>- 1 IPv4 Address
>- 16 IPv6 Addresses
>- Access to 2 CPU Cores

>- Free NodePing


>- Price: $7.00/mo

Order: http://mylovevps.com/hostbill/?cmd=cart&action=add&id=292

====================================

****FAQ? ** **

Do you have an ISO list?

>    Yes we do ([click here](http://mylovevps.com/hostbill/index.php?/knowledgebase/article/14/iso-list---template-list/)), anything not there just ask and we will add it for you.

How can I pay?

>    We currently only accept PayPal at the present time.

Are your servers instantly setup?

>    Yes they are.

Do you have 24/7 support?

>    Yes we provide 24/7 support via out support ticket system.

Do you have any test IPs & files?

>    Yes we do they are located here: http://www.lovevps.com/locations/#contentFlorida-tab.

====================================

Any questions be sure to email me on matthew@lovevps.com or grab me on Skype: LoveVPS.

If you require a quote for any services please drop us an email and we will do our best to help.
